name: relievedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you are happy that something unpleasant has not happened or has ended: She smiled relievedly when the doctor told her the results of the tests. He puffed out his cheeks relievedly when he finally got to the other side of the rope bridge.
More examplesFewer examplesThank goodness we can now relievedly return to a more peaceful time."There it is," the guide said relievedly when the house finally came into view between the trees.She put her phone down relievedly, confident now that her friends were safely home.
